text:
Hey <!everyone>! Did you know today is the official *NATIONAL MENTORING DAY*?!
>A BIG THANK YOU!! You're truly a blessing in disguise for every student you lend a hand to :clap::clap:

Meanwhile, here's a mentoring-themed quote for you! Happy Friday!
```"The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to others their own" - Benjamin Disraeli```

<@U00> uploaded a file: <https://prospelaautumn1.slack.com/files/U7CQMS6N4/F7QBVSB41/national_mentoring_day_27th_oct.jpg|National Mentoring Day 27th Oct.jpg> and commented: We're hanging one of these up at Prospela HQ right now...
